title: How to Make Green Tea Noodle Soup

steps.headline: Drain the tofu.
steps.description: Cut it into cubes about 1.5 centimeter (0.6 in) in size.

steps.headline: Cook the noodles.
Pour 1.5 liters (0.4 US gal) of water into a large saucepan.
Heat the water over medium to high heat until the dashi granules dissolve.
steps.description: Then turn the heat up to high and bring to the boil.

steps.headline: When boiling, add the mirin and soy sauce.
Place even amounts of cooked noodles in four bowls.
steps.description: Add the tofu cubes in even amounts.

steps.headline: Pour the hot soup stock over the noodles.
Garnish.
steps.description: Sprinkle each bowl with nor and toasted sesame seeds.
